person.persName: Benjamin Hamilton (Floyd County, KY, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia Hamilton. Farmer in Floyd County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 10, 1861, to January 31, 1865.
